Summary: A lot of lights in the sky.
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my friend where driving from hartford to lawrence like about 11:30 or so in the night my frind was in another car following me so i kind of look to my left in to the sky when i saw all this lights in the sky i think they were like 100 first i was thinking that were airplanes but then i said to my self they can't be flying like that in group then i call my friend to his phone and i ask him do u see all those lights in the sky and he ask me where? i responde to your left see the sky to your left and he said yes yes i see them pull over we pullover we saw this 2 or 3 minutes then they dissapier this event ocured the night of july 24 2010 betwen hartford mi and lawrence
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hartford
This sighting has never been favorited.
